title: Convex skill: Complete user deletion pattern
description: Add a workflow to the Convex skill that provides the pattern for complete user deletion - deleting user AND all related data across tables (progress, preferences, logs, etc). This pattern will be used by SongScript and other Convex projects.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Document pattern: find user by email, get userId
Document pattern: delete from auth tables (user, session, account)
Document pattern: delete from all app tables with userId foreign key
Include table discovery query to find all tables with userId field
Include example mutation code for deleteUserAndAllData
Document index usage (by_user, by_email) for efficient deletion
Add CLI command pattern: npx convex run admin:deleteUserAndAllData
